Automate your alerts

You have the option to automate your alerts and send them to any broker of your choice for trade execution, allowing you to start generating profits.
You'll need to use one of the available TradingView automation softwares that will be provided by a third-party application.

These are some companies that you can use

{% include "include/docs/automation_sites.html" %}

Alert messages

Each automation company will provide you with the types of messages that you will need to automate the trades. The messages will be for entry and exit signals.
Checkout the alerts page to see where you can add the alert messages and create the TradingView alert.

Webhook URL

The final step is to copy the webhook URL that you'll get from the automation company and paste it into the webhook URL field in TradingView when you create the alert.
